issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment GB-79
issue.discussion: The library provides several traits mechanisms intended a customization points for users. Typically, they are declared in headers that are growing quite large. This is not a problem for standard library vendors, who can manage their internal file structure to avoid large dependencies, but can be a problem for end users who have no option but to include these large headers.
issue.resolution:
Move the following traits classes into their own headers, and require the existing header to #include the traits header to support backwards compatibility:
iterator_traits (plus the iterator tag-types)
allocator_traits
pointer_traits
char_traits
regex_traits
